location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: There is a small amount of insect damage at the bottom edge of this folio. The legibility of the text has not been affected.

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon at Bushire, that he (Stannus) will be leaving Bushire in a few days for a tour of the Arabian coast. Stannus places Riach in charge of the Residency during his absence and provides details of various duties which may need to be carried out.
